review: In the short term, it's meeting expectations, just had to be a pest to AT&T; to boost internet speed for video quality.  We'll see how we do from here on out.

review: Works great it may replace my IPAD fro travel!

review: wasnt sure if i wanted this or not however after getting it i cant imagine life without it, everything syncs up really nicely and alot of great prime movies for free i think i watch this more then my cable, i may get rid of cable and just keep this soon.
author: Chris

review: im on road a lot and this is compact and easy to connect to any TV
